stories.text:
I'm looking to integrate HackerRank type features into my SaaS.

But I don't want to deal with 50 different languages and environment setup.

My use case is like this: I give a HackerRank type coding problem statement, user types/adds code in a codd-editor type form and then I push that code to a 3rd party service check if it's valid, it's running, it's giving desired outputs, etc etc.

Is any APIs available?

I can't use HackerRank's etc directly, as I'm trying to build a similar service.

Please suggest.
stories.title: Ask HN: Any APIs available to integrate code execution as a service?

stories.text:
I haven't worked with WASM yet but the promise of being portable and performance are appealing. I'd like to be able to write something in Rust and have it run natively on either the client or server.

What's your opinion on WASM's viability? Are there any references of it being used in production successfully?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is WASM Viable?
